Title: Requires managed care providers that provide coverage for prescription drugs to provide coverage for home delivery of any covered prescription drug
Summary: Requires managed care providers that provide coverage for prescription drugs to provide coverage for home delivery of any covered prescription by any non-mail-order retail pharmacy in the managed care provider network.
LawCode: Amd ยง364-j, Soc Serv L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the social services law, in relation to requiring managed care providers that provide coverage for prescription drugs to provide coverage for home delivery of any covered prescription drug by any non-mail-order retail pharmacy in the managed care provider network
